description: Unique identifier for the parts manufacturer record; used as the primary key linking to related parts or procurement data.
Date/time this manufacturer record was last updated (likely), stored as yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm; confirm timezone.
Business name of the parts manufacturer or supplier used for purchasing, inventory, or vendor reference.
Identifier of the corresponding manufacturer record in a legacy system; used for historical cross-reference and migrations.
Name of the source table from the legacy system where this manufacturer record originated; supports lineage and data migration mapping.
